summary: The implementation appears comprehensive with all major requirements implemented. The app includes a home page with four categories, product listing with filtering, cart functionality, checkout with payment options, admin panel with product management, and consistent green-themed design. However, several acceptance criteria details are missing or cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Visual feedback confirms item was added to cart
missing_requirements.reason: While add-to-cart functionality exists, there is no clear evidence in ProductCard.tsx of visual feedback (e.g., toast notification, animation, or temporary UI change) confirming the item was added

missing_requirements.requirement: Display UPI QR code for manual payment
missing_requirements.reason: CheckoutPage.tsx is truncated and does not show the implementation of displaying the QR code image when UPI payment method is selected. The UPI button exists but the QR code display logic is not visible

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management functionality with name, address, and phone fields
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend includes UserProfile type and functions (getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) which were explicitly listed as non-goals. The BuildRequest states 'User profiles or order history' as non-goals
The implementation includes a getMyOrders function and useGetMyOrders hook, allowing users to view their order history. This was explicitly listed as a non-goal: 'User profiles or order history'
